snippet: The legal action by the Kentucky senator is one of several challenges to the National Security Agency’s collection of phone records.
abstract: Sen Rand Paul files lawsuit against Pres Obama and the leaders of several intelligence agencies challenging as unconstitutional the National Security Agency’s program that is collecting bulk records about Americans’ phone calls.
lead_paragraph: The legal action by the Kentucky senator is one of several challenges to the National Security Agency’s collection of phone records.

headline.main: Rand Paul Files Lawsuit Over N.S.A. Call Surveillance
headline.print_headline: Rand Paul Sues Over Phone Program
